QuestData.Title: Hataaru, the Artificer
QuestData.Description: I will also need you to call upon Exarch Hataaru. I understand you were helping him with our defenses at the gate.$b$bHataaru is our Chief Artificer - he understands our technology better than any other and has been working tirelessly to recreate the glory of the civilization we left behind.$b$bHe has moved to his workstation outside of the Elodor Dig, our crystal mines located just to the Southeast. Look for him at the mine entrance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Exarch Hataaru outside of the Elodor Dig.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Exarch Hataaru outside of the Elodor Dig in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, $n! I suspected I would see you again soon.$b$bI am willing to speak on your behalf at the Exarch Council, but an emergency situation has come up...
